name: Molten Lava Cake
description: Vegan and gluten free.  Makes 1 3.5 inch Ramekin
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons oil (organic canola or virgin coconut)
1 teaspoons raw sugar ground (for sweeter, I dont add sugar)
1.5 Tablespoon semi sweet chocolate chips vegan
1.5 Tablespoons raw ground almond flour (or ground cashew)
1 teaspoon So Delicious dairy free plain coconut milk yogurt or non dairy yogurt or thick nut milk and a few drops of cider vinegar

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up the maple till it starts to boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat up the maple till it starts to boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the oil and chocolate chips and raw sugar if using and mix well until chocolate melts.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the oil and chocolate chips and raw sugar if using and mix well until chocolate melts.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the coconut yogurt, dry ingredients, mix well. Use a few drops of almond milk if needed to make a smooth batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the coconut yogurt, dry ingredients, mix well. Use a few drops of almond milk if needed to make a smooth batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease ramekin, Pour a little batter in the middle and top with chopped chocolate bar or a big sized chunk on it.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease ramekin, Pour a little batter in the middle and top with chopped chocolate bar or a big sized chunk on it.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop batter all around and on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop batter all around and on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at preheated 375 degrees F for 13-14 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at preheated 375 degrees F for 13-14 minutes.

keywords: cake for one, single serve, vegan cake recipe
